action.old_str:
# Check if gen files are mentioned in output
        gen_mentioned = "src/gen/" in stdout or "src\\gen\\" in stdout
        print(f"Gen files mentioned in output: {gen_mentioned}")
action.new_str:
# Check if gen files are mentioned in output
        gen_mentioned = "src/gen/" in stdout or "src\\gen\\" in stdout or "about.py" in stdout or "design.py" in stdout
        print(f"Gen files mentioned in output: {gen_mentioned}")
        if gen_mentioned:
            print("Gen files found in output - this is expected for non-recursive mode")
